name: My Summer Rollercoaster
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47 in 3 days! Link to LD page

Take on the role of a roller coaster ride operator as you try to keep Rustic Force 2000 from falling apart. Make sure the customer ratings stay high by hitting cart parts with your hammer, tightening nuts with your wrench and putting out fires with your fire extinguisher!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • [1, 2, 3] to select tools (1 for hammer, 2 for wrench, 3 for extinguisher)
  • Mouse 1 to use tool
  • Tap Spacebar to reload Extinguisher
  • Hold Escape to return to main menu
